text:
="preserve">Michel Mongeau (c. 1946 – 11 November 2020) was a Canadian actor. He was best known for his roles in "He Shoots, He Scores" (1989), "Gaz Bar Blues" (2003), "How My Mother Gave Birth to Me During Menopause" (2003), "The Last Tunnel" (2004) and in "Shake Hands with the Devil" (2007).
Mongeau died on 11 November 2020 at the age of 74.

annotations.surface_form: How My Mother Gave Birth to Me During Menopause
